content: On August 7, 1974, Hank Aaron hit the 733rd home run of his illustrious career, surpassing Babe Ruth's long-standing record of 714 homers. This milestone was part of a remarkable season for Aaron, who was chasing down the legendary Ruth as he continued to solidify his place in baseball history. Aaron's achievement on this date further cemented his legacy as one of the greatest hitters of all time while playing for the Atlanta Braves.
